name: Gloomhaven
short_description: Vanquish monsters with strategic cardplay. Fulfill your quest to leave your legacy!

name: Pandemic Legacy: Season 1
short_description: Mutating diseases are spreading around the world - can your team save humanity?

name: Brass: Birmingham
short_description: Build networks, grow industries, and navigate the world of the Industrial Revolution.

name: Gloomhaven: Jaws of the Lion
short_description: Vanquish monsters with strategic cardplay in a 25-scenario Gloomhaven campaign.

name: Terraforming Mars
short_description: Compete with rival CEOs to make Mars habitable and build your corporate empire.

name: Twilight Imperium: Fourth Edition
short_description: Build an intergalactic empire through trade, research, conquest and grand politics.

name: Gaia Project
short_description: Expand, research, upgrade, and settle the galaxy with one of 14 alien species.

name: Star Wars: Rebellion
short_description: Strike from your hidden base as the Rebels—or find and destroy it as the Empire.

name: Spirit Island
short_description: Island Spirits join forces using elemental powers to defend their home from invaders.

name: War of the Ring: Second Edition
short_description: The Fellowship and the Free Peoples clash with Sauron over the fate of Middle-Earth.

name: Through the Ages: A New Story of Civilization
short_description: Rewrite history as you build up your civilization in this epic card drafting game!

name: Great Western Trail
short_description: Use strategic outposts and navigate danger as you herd your cattle to Kansas City.

name: Twilight Struggle
short_description: Relive the Cold War and rewrite history in an epic clash between the USA and USSR.

name: Scythe
short_description: Five factions vie for dominance in a war-torn, mech-filled, dieselpunk 1920s Europe.

name: Dune: Imperium
short_description: Influence, intrigue, and combat in the universe of Dune.

name: The Castles of Burgundy
short_description: Plan, trade, and build your Burgundian estate to prosperity and prominence.

name: Nemesis
short_description: Survive an alien-infested spaceship but beware of other players and their agendas.

name: 7 Wonders Duel
short_description: Science? Military? What will you draft to win this head-to-head version of 7 Wonders?

name: Concordia
short_description: Lead your Roman dynasty and build the greatest trading empire in the Mediterranean.

name: Brass: Lancashire
short_description: Test your economic mettle as you build and network in the Industrial Revolution.

name: Terra Mystica
short_description: Play fantastical factions.  Expand your influence by terraforming and joining cults.

name: A Feast for Odin
short_description: Puzzle together the life of a Viking village as you hunt, farm, craft, and explore.

name: Wingspan
short_description: Attract a beautiful and diverse collection of birds to your wildlife reserve.

name: Arkham Horror: The Card Game
short_description: Investigate the horrors of Arkham while courting cosmic doom.

name: Root
short_description: Decide the fate of the forest as woodland factions fight for contrasting goals.

name: Viticulture Essential Edition
short_description: Create the most prosperous winery in Italy from the Tuscan vineyard you've inherited.

name: Everdell
short_description: Use resources to build a village of critters and constructions in this woodland game.

name: Orléans
short_description: Craftsmen, scholars & monks can help you reign supreme—but who will turn up to help?

name: Clank!: Legacy – Acquisitions Incorporated
short_description: "Go forth, be bold, and ACQUIRE!" in this campaign version of "Clank!"

name: Mage Knight Board Game
short_description: Build your hero’s spells, abilities, and artifacts as you explore & conquer cities.

name: Eclipse: Second Dawn for the Galaxy
short_description: Build an interstellar civilization by exploration, research, conquest, and diplomacy.

name: Lost Ruins of Arnak
short_description: Explore an island to find resources and discover the lost ruins of Arnak.

name: Food Chain Magnate
short_description: Strategically hire and manage your workforce to outcompete rival fast food chains.

name: Puerto Rico
short_description: Ship goods, construct buildings, and choose roles that benefit you more than others.

name: Caverna: The Cave Farmers
short_description: From a simple cave, expand your dwarven home through mining, agriculture, and more.

name: Marvel Champions: The Card Game
short_description: Battle Marvel villains with unique teams of iconic heroes in this LCG.

name: Blood Rage
short_description: Ragnarök has come! Secure your place in Valhalla in epic Viking battles.

name: Too Many Bones
short_description: Toss gobs of unique dice in an epic adventure en route to a final boss showdown.

name: Barrage
short_description: Nations vie for hydroelectric dominance in a dystopia where water is power.

name: Agricola
short_description: Build your farmstead by sowing fields and raising livestock. But don't forget to eat!

name: Ark Nova
short_description: Design a modern zoo to run a successful park and to support conservation projects.

name: Maracaibo
short_description: Seafarers journey to obtain wealth and fame in the 17th century Caribbean.

name: Underwater Cities
short_description: Develop future cities on the seafloor through politics, production, and science.

name: Pandemic Legacy: Season 2
short_description: The world is a mystery after a devastating pandemic—where will your team go?

name: Pax Pamir: Second Edition
short_description: Swing the tides of "The Great Game" as countries vie for control of Afghanistan.

name: Mansions of Madness: Second Edition
short_description: Unravel mysteries in Arkham with your investigative team in this app-guided game.

name: The Crew: The Quest for Planet Nine
short_description: Go on a planet-discovering space mission in this cooperative trick-taking game.

name: Anachrony
short_description: Use Exosuits & time travel to ensure your vision for the future after the cataclysm.

name: Tzolk'in: The Mayan Calendar
short_description: Lead your people, build monuments and make offerings to earn the favour of the gods.

name: Power Grid
short_description: Bid, network, and manage resources in a race to supply the most cities with power.

name: Clans of Caledonia
short_description: Lead your unique Scottish clan to economic might via production, trade, and export.

name: On Mars
short_description: Be a part of the first Martian colony, striving to be the best contributor.

name: Kingdom Death: Monster
short_description: Try to survive in a nightmarish world that lies under eternal darkness.

name: Mechs vs. Minions
short_description: Cooperatively program and pilot your mechs to defeat an army of marauding minions.

name: Star Wars: Imperial Assault
short_description: Play as Rebel or Imperial forces to fulfill mission objectives.

name: Le Havre
short_description: Establish a supply chain by collecting resources, building industries, and shipping.

name: The 7th Continent
short_description: Journey through a vibrant but deadly land to uncover the key to lifting your curse.

name: The Quacks of Quedlinburg
short_description: Pull ingredients from your stock to make your pot bubble, but hopefully not explode!

name: Crokinole
short_description: Flick discs and make trick shots in this traditional Canadian dexterity game!

name: The Gallerist
short_description: Amass a fortune, and stake your reputation by operating a lucrative art gallery.

name: Lisboa
short_description: Compete to reconstruct the city of Lisboa after the great earthquake of 1755.

name: Azul
short_description: Artfully embellish the walls of your palace by drafting the most beautiful tiles.

name: Eclipse
short_description: Build an interstellar civilization by exploration, research, conquest, and diplomacy.

name: Paladins of the West Kingdom
short_description: Invaders are coming from everywhere.  Keep the faith and defend your homeland.

name: Aeon's End
short_description: Mages defend humanity’s last city, harnessing alien powers to destroy monstrosities.

name: Through the Ages: A Story of Civilization
short_description: Lead your civilization through strategic drafting of leaders, technologies, and more.

name: Android: Netrunner
short_description: Megacorporation versus Netrunner in this futuristic cyberpunk game of cat and mouse.

name: Pandemic Legacy: Season 0
short_description: Work together during the Cold War to prevent a Soviet bio-threat.

name: Race for the Galaxy
short_description: Worlds await! Colonize, develop and conquer taking advantage of others' choices.

name: Clank!: A Deck-Building Adventure
short_description: Claim your treasures but don't attract the dragon in this deck-building dungeon race.

name: Fields of Arle
short_description: Construct dikes, drain bogs, harvest flax and tend to newborn animals in East Frisia.

name: Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island
short_description: Work together — with friends or with Friday — to survive on a deserted island.

name: Teotihuacan: City of Gods
short_description: Use your worker dice to raise the legendary and breathtaking Pyramid of the Sun.

name: Five Tribes
short_description: Move assassins, elders & builders through Naqala to claim oases & control djinns.

name: The Voyages of Marco Polo
short_description: Using unique abilities, fulfill contracts and reach your goals along the Silk Road.

name: 7 Wonders
short_description: Draft cards to develop your ancient civilization and build its Wonder of the World.

name: Agricola (Revised Edition)
short_description: Help your farm to prosper in this updated, streamlined edition of the acclaimed game.

name: Lords of Waterdeep
short_description: Deploy agents and hire adventurers to expand your control over the city of Waterdeep.

name: Dominant Species
short_description: With an ice age approaching, which animals will best propagate, migrate, and adapt?

name: The Crew: Mission Deep Sea
short_description: Dive into the deep sea in this co-operative trick-taking game.

name: Grand Austria Hotel
short_description: Serve guests and prepare rooms to be the best hotelier in the Viennese modern age.

name: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon

name: Architects of the West Kingdom
short_description: Will you be a virtuous or nefarious servant of the king? Build your way to glory.

name: Keyflower
short_description: Compete in a unique auction system to build the most prosperous village.

name: El Grande
short_description: Use your caballeros to control regions of medieval Spain, keeping clear of the King!

name: Caylus

name: Cascadia
short_description: Create the most harmonious ecosystem as you puzzle together habitats and wildlife.

name: Battlestar Galactica: The Board Game
short_description: How can the human race survive when you don't know who is actually human?

name: Twilight Imperium: Third Edition
short_description: Epic empire-building game of interstellar conflict, trade, and struggle for power.

name: Troyes
short_description: Defend the city and rise to power by influencing the merchants, knights and clergy.

name: Dominion: Intrigue
